key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks, including FCC fines and antitrust investigations
Advertising revenue volatility due to cyclical political advertising and cord-cutting trends
Operational challenges from workforce reductions and cost-cutting measures
Content quality and ethical concerns impacting reputation and viewer trust
controversies: FCC fine of $1.8 million for violating TV ownership rules
Antitrust investigations and legal challenges related to alleged price-fixing in local TV advertising
social_issues: Criticisms of local news quality and sensationalism
governance_issues: Regulatory non-compliance and exceeding FCC audience reach cap
Ethical concerns related to antitrust investigations and alleged price-fixing practices
